corpus.zh: 我要給阿Ｑ做正傳﹐已經不止一兩年了。
corpus.en: For several years now I have been meaning to write the true story of Ah Q.

corpus.zh: 但一面要做﹐一面又往回想﹐這足見我不是一個〈立言〉〔２〕的人。
corpus.en: But while wanting to write I was in some trepidation, too, which goes to show that I am not one of those who achieve glory by writing.

corpus.zh: 因為從來不朽之筆﹐須傳不朽之人﹐於是人以文傳﹐文以人傳。
corpus.en: For an immortal pen has always been required to record the deeds of an immortal man, the man becoming known to posterity through the writing and the writing known to posterity through the man.

corpus.zh: 究竟誰靠誰傳﹐漸漸的不甚瞭然起來。
corpus.en: Until finally it is not clear who is making whom known.
